# cortexcloud_outpost_template (Resource)

Manages an outpost template.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cortexcloud_outpost_template" "example" {
  cloud_provider = "AWS"
  custom_resources_tags = [
    {
      key   = "cost_center"
      value = "fin-123"
    },
    {
      key   = "criticality"
      value = "high"
    },
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cloud_provider` (String) The cloud service provider. Possible values are: "AWS", "AZURE", "GCP"

### Optional

- `custom_resources_tags` (Attributes Set) Tags applied to any new resource created by Cortex Cloud in the cloud environment.

The tag `managed_by` with the value `paloaltonetworks` will be applied by default. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--custom_resources_tags))

### Read-Only

- `terraform_module_url` (String) The download link for the Terraform module that is generated by Cortex Cloud upon successful creation of the outpost template. You may download and deploy this module to create the required infrastructure to conduct cloud workload scans in the configured cloud account.

<a id="nestedatt--custom_resources_tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `custom_resources_tags`

Required:

- `key` (String) The tag key.
- `value` (String) The tag value.
